about_the_game:
This is a world in a time of war. Every capable nation and organization has begun to expand its territory, and the player is the ruler of a small town (although it doesn't look like it's a town), relying on the player's skills and the town's inhabitants to keep the town alive in the face of an invasion from outside.

1
The upper limit of the units of both sides is 1:1.5
The game also has multiple caps, which players can adjust according to their hardware level, and the number of units on the field (the more the better, the more bugs).

2
Players can increase their resources and acquire resources through cards and loot
Players can increase the stats of their units through loot and enhancements

3
3
3
This is a development of vegetable chicken ink for a year and a half of the work, due to force majeure reasons had to "those who first reward", and the game in a stable but unstable state, not much content, a lot of bugs.

//

If you decide to "reward from the best", then a final reminder of how long the game will last before you regret it

//
目前暂时没群，但是可以悄悄关注一下B站账号：Woolpe
bug可以发送到邮箱：2318453855@qq.com，或者是B站账号（刷视频的时候会看）
detailed_description:
This is a world in a time of war. Every capable nation and organization has begun to expand its territory, and the player is the ruler of a small town (although it doesn't look like it's a town), relying on the player's skills and the town's inhabitants to keep the town alive in the face of an invasion from outside.

1
The upper limit of the units of both sides is 1:1.5
The game also has multiple caps, which players can adjust according to their hardware level, and the number of units on the field (the more the better, the more bugs).

2
Players can increase their resources and acquire resources through cards and loot
Players can increase the stats of their units through loot and enhancements

3

This is a development of vegetable chicken ink for a year and a half of the work, due to force majeure reasons had to "those who first reward", and the game in a stable but unstable state, not much content, a lot of bugs.

name: 战争时代

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: It is not guaranteed to work properly, but the upper limit can be changed within the game to try to play the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win11
  • Processor: 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1650TI
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This configuration for the author, can be sure to play the game normally
